FuncDef: The display license resource usage port-mode-channel command displays the channelized sub-interface license usage on boards.
CLIs: display license resource usage port-mode-channel { all | slot <slotid> } [ active | deactive ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays usage of the channelized sub-interface license on all the boards of a device.
-

Displays usage of the channelized sub-interface license on a board in a specified slot.
-

Displays usage of the channelized sub-interface license on the board on which the active mode-channel command is run.
-

Displays usage of the channelized sub-interface license on the board on which the active mode-channel command is not run.
-

Examples: [~HUAWEI-license] display license resource usage port-mode-channel all
FeatureName            Offline     Allocated     Activated     Available     Total
Physical Position    FeatureName     Needed Count    Used Count      Active Status
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the channelized sub-interface license usage on all boards or on the board where the active port-mode-channel command is run or not run, run the display license resource usage port-mode-channel command.
